articles.title: Demon Slayer: Thirsty Fans Are Simping for Muzan
articles.author: Hilary Leung
articles.excerpt: Demon Slayer turned Muzan Kibutsuji from evil incarnate to hot evil incarnate in the season finale of the "Swordsmith Village" arc.
articles.summary:
This article contains major spoilers for 
Demon Slayer
 Season 3, Episode 11, "A Connected Bond: Daybreak and First Light," available on Crunchyroll.
 


Demon Slayer
 fans have it bad for one very bad man.
 
The third season of 
Demon Slayer
 recently ended with a 70-minute epic finale titled "A Connected Bond: Daybreak and First Light." The last episode wrapped up the "Swordsmith Village" arc with a major revelation about 
Nezuko being the first and currently only demon to survive the sunlight
.

articles.title: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999 Season 2: Renewed or Cancelled?
articles.author: Mirza Aaqib Beg
articles.excerpt: Inspired by Mashiro's eponymous Japanese manga series, ‘Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru' or ‘My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999' is a romantic-comedy anime. The show follows Akane Kinoshita, an…
articles.summary:
Inspired by Mashiro's eponymous Japanese manga series, ‘Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru' or ‘My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999' is a 
romantic-comedy anime
. The show follows Akane Kinoshita, an ordinary college student whose boyfriend breaks up with her for another girl and leaves her with countless memories that make her miserable. In order to get back her ex-boyfriend, she downloads Forest of Savior, a game that they used to play together. That's where she accidentally runs into the introverted gaming legend Akito Yamada.

articles.title: How to Watch Anime for Free Online in 2023
articles.author: Marla Añonuevo
articles.excerpt: A list of streaming services where you can watch anime for free online. This includes Crunchyroll, HIDIVE, Hulu, RetroCrush, and Tubi.
articles.summary:
Where can you watch 
anime
 for free online? Various streaming platforms have started adding anime to their libraries but which ones are free? Here is a guide on how to watch anime for free online.
 
Watch anime for free on Crunchyroll
 
Crunchyroll is one of the most popular streaming platforms to watch anime. You can watch a limited number of shows for free and with ads. Crunchyroll also has a 14-day free trial for those who want to try Crunchyroll Premium. Aside from ad-free streaming, you have unlimited access to the shows on the platform and you can catch the simulcasts of the current anime season.

articles.title: Crunchyroll Anime Awards Return to Japan in 2024
articles.author: Rayan Sayyed
articles.excerpt: The location and hosts have been revealed for the event.
articles.summary:
The Anime Awards will be back in Japan next year in 2024. 
 
The company has announced that the eighth edition of the Anime Awards will take place in Tokyo, Japan on March 2, 2024. The live ceremony will be held at the Hotel Shin Takanawa, bringing together creators, musicians, and performers at the event.
 
 Anime Awards 2024 hosts


Voice actress Sally Amaki and entertainer Jon Kabira will be returning as hosts for the Anime Awards in 2024. Sally Amaki, a member of the digital voice actor idol project 22/7 (Nanabun no Nijuni), is known for her work as the English and Japanese voice of Carol Olston in Tomo-chan Is a Girl!.

articles.title: 8 most reliable anime-watching sites
articles.author: Koyel Sardar
articles.excerpt: There are many anime-watching sites available now that anime has now become one of the most well-known genres of pop culture with a global fanbase.
articles.summary:
There are many anime-watching sites available now that anime has now become one of the most well-known genres of pop culture with a global fanbase. With the evergrowing popularity of anime, fans all around the world face one big issue, and that is finding a suitable place for a hazard-free legal anime-watching experience among the several illegal streaming sites.

Although there are various websites where fans can go and binge-watch their favorite anime series, not all are legal. This means that they have no license to stream those anime.

Its actions were aimed at someone disseminating infringing ideas on MASSIVE grades, for advantage.

articles.title: Crunchyroll Summer 2023 anime schedule revealed
articles.author: Rohan Jagannath
articles.excerpt: Crunchyroll has released its anime schedule for Summer 2023, and the lineup is quite exciting. There are plenty of anime titles that fans are looking forward to as the days progress.
articles.summary:
Crunchyroll has released its anime schedule for Summer 2023, and the lineup is quite exciting. There are plenty of anime titles that fans are looking forward to as the days progress. Saturday, July 1, will mark the beginning of the summer anime season, which is exciting for the entire anime community as it features a good mix of both new releases and returns.

With titles like Mushoku Tensei season 2 and Horimiya: The Missing Pieces on the list, fans have plenty of reasons to be excited for. Cruncyhroll's Summer 2023 list also features a mix of various genres that include action, issekai, slice of life, and much more.

articles.title: The 8th Crunchyroll Anime Awards date and hosts announced
articles.author: Tulisha srivastava
articles.excerpt: The 8th Crunchyroll Anime Awards will be held in 2024. Here's everything you need to know about it, including its date and the hosts.
articles.summary:
Published: 2023-06-21T09:20:57
  ❘   
Updated: 2023-06-21T09:21:08


Crunchyroll, the leading anime streaming service, has announced the return of the eighth edition of the Crunchyroll Anime Awards. Here's everything we know about it.
 
Debuted in 2017, the 
Crunchyroll
 Anime Awards quickly became a global sensation as fans voted for their favorite series worldwide. The Crunchyroll Anime Awards is a major annual awards program that recognizes fan-favorite anime programs, characters, and creators from streaming, film, and music.

articles.title: Does Anime Get A Pass For Being Original?
articles.author: invalid@example.com
articles.excerpt:
Compared to the West, there seems to be a new anime every six months, give or take.

The West when it comes to Hollywood seems to be rehashing, remaking, or rebooting almost anything from the past. Not to mention making sequels or prequels.

However, Japan often makes a lot of new content and...
articles.summary:
Anime is varied, so much that as an anime fan you just don't like everything that "looks anime", just like Metal music genre.



There are tons of new anime each quarter (season) and there's always one genre dominating for which there are good and bad stories, there are fans, haters, etc. Inside anime fans communities.



Anime is so big that it's just so different going from one story to the other and even i have ditched series for looking too "light novel-y" but ended up being amazing after I watched it of recommendation.

articles.title: Why Even the Most Accurate Live-Action Anime Adaptations Are Inherently Flawed
articles.author: Jennifer Melzer
articles.excerpt: While anime adaptations can bring a manga's story to life in an animated setting, live-action anime adaptations have obstacles they can't overcome.
articles.summary:
Over the years, there has been an overabundance of live-action anime adaptations, exploring everything from 
Dragon Ball
 and 
Death Note
 to 
Bleach
 and the upcoming 
One Piece
 live-action movie. While some aren't absolutely horrible, they definitely don't come anywhere close to touching the anime that inspired them. No matter how hard producers try to make an impact and take advantage of the massive fan followings anime franchises have, they repeatedly fail to impress fans, but why?
 
According to Canadian philosopher Marshall McLuhan's pioneering study from 1964, 
Understanding Media: The Extensions of Man
, "The form of a medium embeds itself in the message, creating a symbiotic relationship by which the medium influences how the message is perceived.

articles.title: 10 Best Anime Comedies
articles.author: Kaylie Fielden
articles.excerpt: The best series for good laughs!
articles.summary:
Anime might be most well known for tackling genres like action and romance, but the 
best anime comedies 
are some of the funniest TV series to ever exist. While dramas and intense battle shonen have always risen to the top of popularity lists, comedy is just as important to the history of anime. After all, comedy is enjoyable no matter what genre of anime fans prefer.
 
Laughing is the perfect way to wind down after a long day, and funny anime series are a good distraction when life is a bit too much.

articles.title: 20 Memes From The World Of Anime
articles.author: popcorn
articles.excerpt: For the people who love anime and for the people who love memes, we've compiled the best of both worlds for everyone to enjoy.
articles.summary:
Attention, 
anime
 enthusiasts and 
meme
 connoisseurs! Prepare to be immersed in the vivid and humorous world of "anime memes." These visual treats mix recognizable characters, memorable locations and smart captions to create a meme experience designed just for 
otaku
 culture. Anime memes capture the essence of our favorite anime episodes and characters, from the ludicrous to the realistic.


These memes bring the fun of anime to life in a whole new manner, whether it's a humorous spin on a well-known cliche, a clever allusion to a memorable moment, or a relevant joke slapped on an anime meme template.

articles.title: Jangan Salah Pilih, Ini 10 Website Nonton Anime yang Legal
articles.author: Tifani
articles.excerpt: Setidaknya ada 10 website nonton anime secara legal yang dapat diakses para pecinta anime. Berikut 10 website nonton anime secara legal agar dapat menonton anime dengan nyaman.
articles.summary:
Anime adalah film animasi buatan Jepang, yang kini berkembang menjadi bentuk budaya populer. Bagi para penggemarnya film kartun tersebut sebagai tontonan hari-hari, lantaran cerita kerap menginspirasi.
 
Ada banyak pilihan platform dan website 
nonton anime
 secara resmi. Website nonton anime yang legal jelas memberikan kualitas video yang baik dengan mendukung resolusi HD.
 
Para penggemar anime tidak dianjurkan nonton anime melalui situs-situs ilegal seperti Samehadaku atau semacamnya. Pasalnya, pengalaman menonton akan banyak diganggu oleh pop-up iklan, yang tidak bisa dijamin keamanannya.

articles.title: ¿Se puede aprender japonés solamente viendo anime?
articles.author: Pedro Venegas
articles.excerpt: Muchos fans de la animación japonesa se preguntan si es posible aprender el idioma japonés solo con ver puros anime. Pues bien, esta es una cultura y un mundo c
articles.summary:
El anime puede enseñarte algunas palabras en japonés
Muchos fans de la animación japonesa se preguntan si es posible aprender el idioma japonés solo con ver puros anime. Pues bien, esta es una cultura y 
un mundo completamente diferente
, por eso cuando se trata de anime, los fans valoran mucho a los actores de voz que interpretan a los personajes que le dan vida a las historias. De esta manera, es más 
solicitado y respetado el idioma original
 de las cintas, siendo esto el ocasionante de que muchos espectadores sientan la motivación de aprender japonés.

articles.title: Crunchyroll News Takes New Step in Anime Evolution with a New Website,, Expanded Editorial Covereage, and Brand New Features to Serve Fans Globally
articles.excerpt: Newly Expanded Crunchyroll News Brings Fans Even More Breaking News, Content, Customization and Accessibility Los Angeles, CA (June 20, 2023) Crunchyroll, the global brand offering the ultimate anime…
articles.summary:
Newly Expanded 
Crunchyroll
 News Brings Fans Even More Breaking News, Content, Customization and Accessibility


Los Angeles, CA (June 20, 2023) 
Crunchyroll
, the global brand offering the ultimate anime experience, is today relaunching the award-winning news division 
Crunchyroll News
 to meet the global appetite of anime fans who want to stay up to date on news and information about the world of anime. 
Crunchyroll
 News is also expanding its content, deploying a newly designed site and introducing new features to continue serving as fans' go-to-source for all things anime.

articles.title: Funimation: The Ultimate Destination for Anime Fans
articles.author: Rebecca Jones
articles.excerpt: Are you an anime fan? Look no further than Funimation! Discover the ultimate destination for all things anime, from classic favorites to new releases.
articles.summary: As an avid anime fan, I am always on the lookout for platforms that can provide me with a vast library of anime series and movies to satisfy my cravings for Japanese animation. One such platform that has consistently stood out from the rest is Funimation. Funimation is a leading streaming service that has been serving the anime community for years, offering a wide range of classic and new releases. In this article, we will explore the history and evolution of Funimation, its streaming service and library, popular anime series available, exclusive partnerships and collaborations, impact on the anime industry, community and fan engagement, subscription plans and pricing, as well as its mobile app and accessibility.
articles.authors: Anime For,Everything Related To Comics,Manga,Rebecca Jones

articles.title: Summer Anime 2023: Every new anime that you can watch
articles.author: Gokul Chettiyar
articles.excerpt: With the Summer Anime 2023 season inching closer, several anime are set to be released soon. However, it could be difficult to keep track of all the anime that are about to be released.
articles.summary:
With the Summer Anime 2023 season inching closer, several anime are set to be released soon. However, it could be difficult to keep track of all the anime that are about to be released. In addition, some might mix up the release dates of the anime that are about to premiere.

Hence, we have brought you a list of all anime that are set to be released during the Summer 2023 Anime season. This includes all the TV anime, which will be released weekly, and the Original Net Animations, all the episodes for which will be released together.

articles.title: Chainsaw Man: What's Next for the Hit Anime?
articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: Chainsaw Man was one of the most highly anticipated new anime releases of 2022 overall, so now [...]
articles.summary: Chainsaw Man was one of the most highly anticipated new anime releases of 2022 overall, so now that it's been some time since the anime's run, what could be next for the hit Chainsaw Man anime? Tatsuki Fujimoto 's original Chainsaw Man manga series was already a massively popular release among fans, and was one of the most requested anime adaptations since it first kicked off with Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump magazine. But it wasn't until the manga wrapped up its first part with the magazine that an anime adaptation was announced.

articles.title: POM Launches New Subsidiary POM Anime at Annecy 2023
articles.excerpt: The anime arm kicks off with festival screening of ‘The First Slam Dunk' feature, based on the ‘Slam Dunk' manga series, slated for release in cinemas across Scandinavia, Poland, Baltics, Greece, and…
articles.summary:
Last week at Annecy 2023, Piece of Magic Entertainment (POM) launched its new subsidiary, POM Anime – coinciding with the acquisition of distribution rights to the anime film, The First Slam Dunk, which screened at the festival. The film, to be released under the POM Anime banner, is slated for theatrical release across Scandinavia, Poland, Baltics, Greece, and the Central European region late Summer 2023.

In recent years, POM has distributed popular anime titles, including Demon Slayer: Mugen Train, Jujutsu Kaisen 0, and One-Piece Film: Red.

articles.title: Crunchyroll Announces Summer 2023 Anime Schedule
articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: The Summer anime season is coming in just a little over a week from the time of this writing, and [...]
articles.summary: The Summer anime season is coming in just a little over a week from the time of this writing, and Crunchyroll has announced their full release schedule for the new wave of releases hitting for the Summer 2023 anime schedule. This Summer in particular features some pretty huge returns for anime franchises fans had been waiting to see quite a while, and Crunchyroll will be offering many of these releases as they have revealed the first slate of additions coming over the next few months as the new wave of Summer anime kicks into high gear starting to scream next month.

articles.title: Anime Adventures codes June 2023
articles.author: Chris Scullion
articles.excerpt: Codes for gems and summon tickets can be found here…
articles.summary:
Anime Adventures codes can be used in the much-loved 
Roblox
 game to get gems, summon tickets and more.
Anime Adventures is a Roblox game inspired by anime series like Naruto, Dragon Ball and One Piece (though it's not official, so character names have been changed slightly).
Created by Gomu, the tower defense game was originally released in July 2022 and has become extremely popular.
In the game, players can also redeem codes in order to acquire free gems, summon tickets and other rewards. These codes are often reset, so you should check back here regularly to find out which 
Anime Adventures codes
 are working, and which have already expired.

articles.title: El anime NieR:Automata Ver 1.1a regresa y estrenará sus últimos cuatro episodios de forma simultánea
articles.author: tilla
articles.excerpt: El anime fue pausado en marzo pasado debido al Covid-19.
articles.summary:
Hace unas semanas es que el anime NieR:Automata Ver 1.1a debió pausar su emisión. El tiempo ha pasado y ahora ha sido dado a conocer qu
e el anime regresa y estrenará sus últimos episodios de forma simultánea. 
Según fue dado a conocer el anime retomará su emisión este 23 de julio en Japón 
estrenando sus episodios del 9 al 12 de forma simultánea. 
Cabe recordar que el anime, estrenado en enero, tuvo una emisión bastante problemática primero retrasando su episodio número cuatro y 
posteriormente pausando su emisión en marzo, ambas situaciones debido al Covid-19.

articles.title: Crunchyroll Anime Awards regresará a Tokio en 2024
articles.excerpt: Sally Amaki y Jon Kabira regresarán como los anfitriones de la gala que premia a lo mejor del mundo de los anime
articles.summary:
Crunchyroll anunció hoy que la octava edición de los 'Crunchyroll Anime Awards' regresará a Tokio, Japón, el 2 de marzo de 2024 con una ceremonia en vivo para honrar a los creadores, músicos y artistas que impulsan la animación japonesa conocida como anime.

La conducción de los premios estará a cargo de la actriz de doblaje de voz Sally Amaki y el presentador Jon Kabira, quienes estarán regresando como anfitriones de la pasada edición.

Amaki es miembro del Nanabun no Nijuni, una colaboración entre Sony Music y ANIPLEX, así como la voz en inglés y en japonés del personaje Carol Olston en 'Tomo-chan Is a Girl'.

articles.title: Anime Statistics and Facts By Country, Rating and Market Size
articles.author: Barry Elad
articles.excerpt: Anime Statistics: 33% of the population in Japan either watch anime or read manga regularly. 33% resulted in 41.5 million.
articles.summary:
Skip to content
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 Barry Elad 
 
Updated · Jun 21, 2023
 
 
 
 
 
 
Anime Statistics: Anime and cartoons are the two most entertaining mediums for children around the world. But even though both of the content seem similar it differs from each other. Anime is more likely to be based on human-like characters while the cartoon visualized characters. 
Anime
 is more popular in Japan while cartoon is famous all over the globe. Slowly, as the entertainment industry is growing, Anime shows, movies, and likewise content has become available on various OTT platforms.

articles.title: Hell's Paradise Cosplay Shows Off Yuzuriha's Skill
articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku made its anime debut together with the rest of the wave of new anime [...]
articles.summary: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku made its anime debut together with the rest of the wave of new anime releases for the Spring 2023 anime schedule a couple of months ago, and one awesome cosplay is highlighting Yuzuriha's role in it all by showing off her skill in a cool way! Yuji Kaku's original Hell's Paradise manga wrapped up its run with Shueisha's Jump+ app some time ago, but the franchise has made a major comeback thanks to it officially getting a new anime adaptation from the same studio behind Attack on Titan' s final season, Vinland Saga Season 2, Jujutsu Kaisen and more.

articles.title: Haikyuu prepara una gran novedad para su final
articles.author: José Alejandro Mendoza

articles.summary:
El final del anime Haikyuu está muy cerca, y llegará con una gran novedad.
La serie de anime Haikyuu ha logrado convertirse en uno de 
los mejores y más recomendados anime de la historia
. Centrado en el joven Hinata Shoyo, este anime deportivo muestra cómo este joven lucha por 
cumplir su sueño de convertirse en un gran jugador de voleibol
, y ser tan bueno como su ídolo, 'El Pequeño Gigante'.
Estrenada en el año 2014, esta serie rápidamente se volvió bastante popular, y logró obtener gran reconocimiento a nivel mundial.

Download: 
Crunchyroll Anime Awards To Return To Japan In 2024
 
 
The orange carpet is about to be rolled out for anime's best and brightest in a star-studded celebration of anime!Crunchyroll, the international brand delivering the ultimate anime experience, is announcing today that the eighth edition of the Crunchyroll Anime Awards will return to Tokyo, Japan on March 2, 2024 with a live ceremony at the Hotel Shin Takanawa celebrating the creators, musicians, and performers powering the global love of anime.

articles.title: Gen Z Watches More Anime Than Any Other Generation
articles.author: Renee Senzatimore
articles.excerpt: According to a recent data, Gen Z's love of anime supersedes that any previous generation, with over 65% of Zoomers tuning in to watch.
articles.summary:
The results are in - Zoomers watch more 
anime
 than any other generation.
 
As detailed on 
Anime Dork
, YourDictionary recently utilized its WordFinder function to determine which generation was most actively engaged in the anime community. Based on a sample size of 1,000 users, Gen Z has the highest percentage of anime fans, with over 69% stating that they watch it. This number is nearly 10% higher than millennials, just below Gen Z at 57%. Gen X has the third-highest viewership, with a modest 40%.

Love Stage!! The Manga series ran from 2010 to 2016 with seven beautiful volumes. Due to its popularity among readers, Lantis and Kadokawa Shoten produced an anime version of the manga series in 2014 with ten episodes.

articles.title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 2 Episode Count Emerges
articles.author: Evan Valentine
articles.excerpt: The Isekai genre has become a big money maker in the anime world, and as more Isekai stories hit [...]
articles.summary: The Isekai genre has become a big money maker in the anime world, and as more Isekai stories hit the small screen, there are some fan favorites that are helping to lead the charge. Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation has a plot that might seem commonplace to many anime fans, but thanks to its characters, stories, and the way the anime approaches the world, it has become a fan favorite. Looking to arrive next month on July 2nd, the series has confirmed how many episodes fans can expect for the return of Rudy and the magical world he finds himself in.

articles.title: Is Netflix's Skull Island An Anime? What We Know About Powerhouse Animation's Style
articles.author: Rick Stevenson
articles.excerpt: Netflix's new "Skull Island" series adds a fresh chapter to the MonsterVerse saga, but is it technically anime? Well, not exactly, but it's close.
articles.summary:
The eternal question: Is it anime, or is it just better than we expect from Western animation? The debate has risen up again in the case of "Skull Island," the new Netflix series that's part of Legendary Pictures' MonsterVerse franchise. As fans await the 
release of "Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire" in 2024
, they can stay involved in the kaiju (sorry, 
Titan
) saga with the latest foray into King Kong's tropical home. But is "Skull Island" anime or not?
 
The short answer is no. "Skull Island" is produced by Powerhouse Animation Studios — a company responsible for past Netflix hits like "Castlevania," "Masters of the Universe: Revelation," and "Blood of Zeus.

articles.title: Genshin Impact's Anime Reportedly Features Better Animation Than Demon Slayer
articles.author: Hilary Leung
articles.excerpt: The anime adaptation of Genshin Impact, produced by Demon Slayer studio ufotable, will allegedly boast higher animation quality than Demon Slayer.
articles.summary:
If 
Demon Slayer
's excellent animation quality was a 10/10, 
Genshin Impact
's anime adaptation would allegedly be 11/10.
 
According to a self-professed Anime News Account @/oecuf0, who regularly tweets leaks regarding the animanga industry, the anime adaptation of 
Genshin Impact
 will reportedly contain higher quality animation than 
Demon Slayer
. The account fortified the claim with a reply, saying, "The staff is very strong." 
ufotable
 helms both of the series. Since its anime adaptation announcement in 2022, HoYoverse has not disclosed any other details about the project, including staff details.

articles.title: Haikyu Announces Farewell Event for the Anime's Finale
articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: Haikyuu!!'s anime is gearing up for the its grand finale with two new movie projects now in the [...]
articles.summary: Haikyuu!!'s anime is gearing up for the its grand finale with two new movie projects now in the works bringing it all to an end, and Haikyuu!! is celebrating with the announcement of a major new event meant to say farewell to the massively popular anime franchise! Haruichi Furudate's original Haikyuu!! manga series recently celebrated its 10th Anniversary for its original debut in Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump magazine, and although the manga has been over for a while, fans have been anxiously waiting for the anime to return.

articles.title: Season Ketiga Anime Classroom of the Elite akan Diundur hingga Tahun Depan, Apa Alasannya?
articles.author: Handaru Atma Veda
articles.excerpt: Season 3 Anime Classroom of the Elite yang sejatinya tayang pada tahun 2023 ini, diundur hingga tahun depan.
articles.summary:
PR DEPOK – Anime merupakan adaptasi dari light novel karya Shōgo Kinugasa dan ilustrasinya dibuat oleh Shunsaku Tomose. Light novel nya mulai dirilis oleh Media Factory's Monthly Comic Alive magazine. Pada tahun 2015 hingga 2019.

Lalu setelah light novel makin populer dibuat anime season pertamanya pada tahun 2018. Kadokawa bersama dengan Studio Anime Lerche melanjutkan untuk membuat season kedua yang tayang pada Juli 2022.

Bagi yang belum mengetahui anime ini menceritakan sebuah sekolah elite SMA Ikusei Kodo, yang memiliki standar akademis yang tinggi dan menghasilkan beberapa alumni yang sukses di dunia pendidikan maupun pekerjaan.

articles.title: The Quintessential Quintuplets Shares New Trailer Ahead of Anime Return
articles.author: Nick Valdez
articles.excerpt: The Quintessential Quintuplets is coming back with a new anime this Summer, and now fans have been [...]
articles.summary: The Quintessential Quintuplets is coming back with a new anime this Summer, and now fans have been given the first look at what to expect from the anime's return with a new trailer for the upcoming The Quintessential Quintuplets anime special! The anime taking on Negi Haruba's original The Quintessential Quintuplets manga wrapped up its TV anime run with two seasons under its belt and a debut feature film that brought the final moments of the anime's story to an end. But that also means that there were some moments from the manga that never quite made it to the anime adaptation.

articles.title: Dynamic Harry Potter AI Art Reimagines Movies As A Studio Ghibli Anime
articles.author: Ryan Northrup
articles.excerpt: Would Harry Potter work as an anime?
articles.summary:
A new piece of 
Harry Potter
 AI art reimagines the films as anime stories from Studio Ghibli. Based on the beloved novels by author J.K. Rowling, the world of 
Harry Potter
 first graced movie screens back in 2001. The hit franchise now consists of eight films in the mainline series and three spinoffs, with a TV show remake now also on the way, all of them being live-action.
 
Now, a new post from 
@aigeneratednonsense
 on Instagram imagines what the 
world of 
Harry Potter
 would look like if Studio Ghibli made it as an anime.

articles.title: Why Do Anime Characters Have Nosebleeds? The Answer Is Kind of NSFW
articles.author: Callie  Cadorniga
articles.excerpt: Why do anime characters' noses bleed so often? The answer is kind of NSFW. Here is everything you need to know about this trope, explained.
articles.summary:
Home
 > 
Entertainment
 > 
Anime
Why do anime characters' noses bleed so often? The answer is kind of NSFW. Here is everything you need to know about this trope, explained.
By 
Callie (Carlos) Cadorniga
Jun. 22 2023, Published 6:01 p.m. ET
Source: A-1 Pictures
'Blend-S'
Anyone who's used to the visual storytelling medium of 
Japanese animation
 is probably used to all of its quirks when it comes to characters expressing themselves. There's the giant sweatdrop for when people feel awkward about a situation, that little veiny cross on their foreheads when they're angry, or sometimes, they'll go full-on chibi whenever they're utterly bewildered by the goings-on around them.

articles.title: Coheed And Cambria Reveals Top 10 Anime
articles.author: Evan Valentine
articles.excerpt: Anime's continued rise in popularity in the world is arriving in some unexpected places. With [...]
articles.summary:
Anime's continued rise in popularity in the world is arriving in some unexpected places. With celebrities like Michael B. Jordan and John Boyega sharing their love of anime, even musicians find themselves falling in love with the medium. Megan The Stallion has shared her love of all things anime more times than we can count, and now, the musicians of the band Coheed And Cambria haven't just shared their top ten anime series, but have also created a new music video using an anime influence.

Coheed And Cambria has had a long history in the rock world, first forming in 1995 and creating ten albums since in their history.

articles.title: Habiskan Uang Rp 89 Juta Demi Sebuah Action Figure Anime Favoritnya, Reza Arap: Wiw Mimisan
articles.author: Irfan Kafril
articles.excerpt: ungkap kecintaannya pada anime, Reza Ara ternyata miliki action figeure yang harganya mahal banget!
articles.summary:
Kapanlagi.com
 - Reza Oktovian atau ternyata punya kegilaan terhadap anime. Mantan suami Wendy Walters ini juga punya tiga deretan anime favoritnya yaitu, Naruto, Hunter x Hunter, dan Attack On Titan.
Saat ditemui di kawasan Jakarta Barat, Kamis (15/6) Reza pun menceritakan bagaimana kecintaannya pada anime. Ia mengatakan bahwa di rumah, ada banyak koleksi yang berkaitan dengan anime.
Bahkan koleksinya ini juga memiliki harga yang fantastis. Reza berujar bahwa koleksinya yang paling mahal adalah sebuah action figure Naruto seharga Rp 80 Jutaan.

articles.title: Ayakashi Triangle to rebroadcast the anime from episode 1
articles.author: Gokul Chettiyar
articles.excerpt: In March 2023, it was announced that Ayakashi Triangle was set to be rebroadcasted from the first episode.
articles.summary:
In March 0, it was announced that Ayakashi Triangle was set to be rebroadcasted from the first episode. Following that, the anime has finally released a new PV and announced the rebroadcast premiere date as Monday, July 0, 0.

Kentarou Yabuki's Ayakashi Triangle follows the story of Matsuri Kazamaki. He is an exorcist ninja who wants to protect his childhood friend, Suzu Kanade, an ayakashi medium. However, one day when Shirogane, the "King of Ayakashi" tries to consume Suzu, Matsuri manages to save her.

articles.title: Crunchyroll: These Summer 2023 Anime Will be Available in India

has announced its slate of Summer 2023 anime shows that will be available on its platform. The Summer 2023 anime season starts from July and it will see the popular anime such as Horimiya, and Rent-a-Girlfriend. 
 
 also unveiled a number of shows from Summer 2023 that will get Hindi dubs. You can check out the slate of upcoming Hindi dubbed anime on here.
 
The current lineup of anime set to debut on in in Summer 2023 is as follows. Note that the dates are only for the subtitled versions, du

articles.title: Crunchyroll News Relaunches With Expanded Coverage and Features
articles.author: Daniel Frankel
articles.excerpt: Sony-owned niche SVOD touts new website, broader editorial coverage and new features for its news platform
articles.summary:
Crunchyroll, the specialty subscription streaming service acquired by Sony in 2021, is doubling down on the news platform it uses to lure and service its anime fans.

The relaunched Crunchroll News will include an expanded staff generating more breaking anime news, as well as larger features about the industry. Anime experts will expand production of weekly columns. And from "cosplay roundups" to polls to quizzes, Crunchyroll is simply promising more news content all around, not to mention a snazzy new website.
